name: ChronicHeartFailureWithPreservedEjectionFractionDiastolicHeartFailure
title: Chronic Heart Failure With Preserved Ejection Fraction (Diastolic Heart Failure)
description: Diagnosis of chronic heart failure with preserved or normal EF (HFpEF where LVEF is ≥50%). (Business ID: Entry 20561)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Chronic Heart Failure With Preserved Ejection Fraction (Diastolic Heart Failure).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an diagnosis of chronic heart failure with preserved or normal ef (hfpef where lvef is ≥50%)..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD10CM codes for Chronic Heart Failure With Preserved Ejection Fraction (Diastolic Heart Failure).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Chronic Heart Failure With Preserved Ejection Fraction (Diastolic Heart Failure).)

contains.display: Acute on chronic diastolic (congestive) heart failure
